PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-14772014-12-12,  ,  NR,  CRA,  ,  ,  , 
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectEstates of Kathleen McGowan and William F. McGowan Remission Order
PrecisESTATES OF KATHLEEN MCGOWAN AND WILLIAM F. MCGOWAN REMISSION ORDER which remits a portion of the arrears interest in respect of the 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999 and 2000 taxation years, and late-filing penalties in respect of the 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002 and 2003 taxation years and all relevant interest paid or payable thereon by their estates.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2014-0111 Publication Date: 2014-12-31
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Estates of Kathleen McGowan and William F. McGowan Remission Order
precis: ESTATES OF KATHLEEN MCGOWAN AND WILLIAM F. MCGOWAN REMISSION ORDER which remits a portion of the arrears interest in respect of the 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999 and 2000 taxation years, and late-filing penalties in respect of the 1996, 1997, 1998, 1999, 2000, 2001, 2002 and 2003 taxation years and all relevant interest paid or payable thereon by their estates.
